attributes.action: Show detailed assumptions and calculations of the government’s coronavirus model
attributes.additional_details:
There is only one life per person. Every death devastates a family.
Based on the government’s statement, they need 60% of British population to be infected, which means almost 40 million people. With 1% of fatality, this means 400,000 British death! In addition, 20% of the cases need hospilisation, which means 8,000,000 hospital beds need to be available with the NHS!
The government must provide transparency on this serious issue as early as possible! The British people need to be protected!
attributes.background: The UK government repeatedly claim that their coronavirus strategy is based on the science. They must make the detailed scientific references, assumptions and calculations a open source to the public. Therefore all the scientists could endorse or challenged their model and their decisions.
